com.autogarcon.android.API

Class APIUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.autogarcon.android.API.APIUtils

  • public class APIUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of methods to be used with the API classes, in order to keep their functionality minimal.
    Author:
    Tim Callies

    • Method Detail

      • getCategories

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.util.List<MenuItem>>> getCategories(Menu menu)
        Calculates the categories from a Menu object.
        Parameters:
        menu - Some menu that you want to get categories from.
        Returns:
        A 'map' of the categories, using their name as the key, and a list of the contained menuItems as the value.

      • getActiveMenus

        public static java.util.List<Menu> getActiveMenus(java.util.List<Menu> menuList)
        Looks through a list of menus, and returns only the ones that are active, based on the current time
        Parameters:
        menuList - A list of menus.
        Returns:
        The current active menus

      • currentlyFavorite

        public static boolean currentlyFavorite(java.util.List<Restaurant> favoritesList)
        Parse through a list of favorites received by the API to match with current user and current restaurant
        Parameters:
        favoritesList - A list of all the favorites for all users.
        Returns:
        if the current restaurant is in the user's favorites

      • getMenuItem

        public static MenuItem getMenuItem(OrderItem orderItem)
        Gets the menuItem for a given orderItem
        Parameters:
        orderItem - The orderItem that you want to find a menuItem for
        Returns:
        The menuItem that is being ordered.
